caption: Relating to the authority of the office of the attorney general to make certain examinations and inquiries.
summary: This bill modifies how the Texas attorney general can examine business records. While not directly targeting Chinese entities, it affects all foreign filing entities. Foreign businesses must allow record examination within reasonable time or risk losing business rights in Texas. This could impact Chinese companies or Chinese-owned businesses operating in Texas by subjecting them to potentially broader document examination requirements.
translation: 该法案修改了德克萨斯州检察长检查企业记录的方式。虽然并非直接针对中国实体，但该法案影响所有外国备案实体。外国企业必须在合理时间内允许记录检查，否则可能失去在德克萨斯州的经营权。这可能会影响在德克萨斯州经营的中国公司或中资企业，使它们需要接受可能更广泛的文件检查要求。
committees:
1. Business Commerce Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Judiciary Committee
